metadata.title: USN-6556-1 -- Budgie Extras vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Budgie Extras incorrectly handled certain temporary file paths. An attacker could possibly use this issue to inject false information or deny access to the application. (CVE-2023-49342, CVE-2023-49343, CVE-2023-49347)  Matthias Gerstner discovered that Budgie Extras incorrectly handled certain temporary file paths. A local attacker could use this to inject arbitrary PNG data in this path and have it displayed on the victim's desktop or deny access to the application. (CVE-2023-49344)  Matthias Gerstner discovered that Budgie Extras incorrectly handled certain temporary file paths. A local attacker could use this to inject false information or deny access to the application. (CVE-2023-49345, CVE-2023-49346)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6556-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  budgie-kangaroo-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-brightness-controller-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-trash-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-showtime-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-workspace-stopwatch-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-workspace-wallpaper-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-keyboard-autoswitch-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-wallstreet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-extras-daemon - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-rotation-lock-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-quicknote-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-hotcorners-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-window-shuffler - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-network-manager-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-visualspace-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-countdown-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-extras-common - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-takeabreak-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-recentlyused-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-fuzzyclock-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-clockworks-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-previews - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-quickchar - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-dropby-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-app-launcher-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-applications-menu-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 budgie-weathershow-applet - 1.7.0-3.0ubuntu1 No subscription required
